annotations.paragraph: It took 28 grueling days but Kevin Vallely and his teammate Ray Zahab managed to ski across Ellesmere Island in the Canadian High Arctic, through intolerable frigid conditions.

annotations.paragraph: “You’re going into windchill factors of -70, that kind of range,” Vallely told This is BC.
